name: Topics in Islamic Art and Architecture
description: An examination of a topic in Islamic art and or architecture. Topics vary from year to year; the content in any given year depends upon the instructor. This will be a lecture course for approximately 20 students.[24S]
prerequisites: FAH101H5/FAH202H5, FAH287H5/FAH288H5 and at least 1.0 in FAH/VCC at the 300/400 level, or P.I.
